document_data.mainbody:
rinks was a criminal element who inhabited the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
In the , Brinks was active in the criminal underbelly of Baldurs Gate. The criminal worked with the gang called the Dead Eyes â€“ enemies of Astele Keenes Guild. Brinks also gambled and did not joke when the time came to collect the winnings. The unlucky Bruno Indomicus found himself indentured to Captain Grisly and Bosun Gannet of the Blushing Mermaid as well as to Brinks, loosing coin in Baldurs Bones. Brinks demanded Bosun Gannet chop Brunos finger off as a warning, but the innkeeper turned the request down, offering instead to buy the dwarfs debt out.
